content.question: In lines 2-3, iramque minasque supplicibus supera votis is translated

choices.label: and humble prayers may overcome her anger and threats
and overcome her anger and threats with humble prayers
and angrily overcome both her threats and humble prayers
and her anger and threats will overcome your humble prayers

content.answer: and overcome her anger and threats with humble prayers

unit.text: 6: Course Project and Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry
